summary: 2016 FORD FUSION MAKING LOUD RATTLING NOISE FROM ENGINE. NO CHECK ENGINE LIGHT EVER CAME ON, BUT FORD SAYING ENGINE IS CATASTROPHIC ENGINE FAILURE. CONNECTING ROD IN PISTON BROKE LOOSE. HOW DOES NO CHECK ENGINE LIGHT EVER COME ON? THIS COULD HAVE KILLED ME ON THE HIGHWAY. HOW DOES A 3 YEAR OLD CAR WITH 128,000 (MOSTLY HIGHWAY) MILES GO INTO CATASTROPHIC ENGINE FAILURE? CAR HAS BEEN METICULOUSLY MAINTAINED.
